name: 芮祥鵬
objective:
本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：
(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。
(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
schedule:
Course Outline and Syllabus
. Structure of Polymers (1 week)
.The Deformation of an Elastic Solid (1 week)
. Rubber-Like Elasticity (2 weeks)
. Principles of Linear Viscosity (1 week)
. The Measurement of Viscoelastic Behavior (2 weeks)
. Time Temperature Supersosition (1 week)
. Anisotropic Mechanical Behavior (1 week)
.Polymer Composites (1 week)
.Relaxation Transitions: Molecular Interpretation (1 week)
.Creep, Relaxation, and Non-linear Viscoelasticity (1 week)
.Breaking Phenomena (1 week)
Two weeks are reserved for mid-term and final tests. Additionally, 3 weeks are reserved for reviewing term papers.
scorePolicy:
Mid term: 30%
Final (including oral presentation): 40%
HW: 30%
materials:
